Welcome to Dakota Direct



Welcome to my website. This website contains Essays, a daily Log, along with helpful infomation and lists for your personal development referred to as Shells壳, which are sorted via Tags. A collection of nightly Dreams. Please also view external resources such the Webring, the Library containing PDF's and links used on this site. A work in progress Site Graph. Finally there is an image Gallery. You can change the theme using the change theme button. Underneath that is my twitter and some of my projects I have worked on. Thanks for visiting.
